newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - DESC raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - DESC raised to buy.

text.p: -- JP Morgan said on Tuesday that it is upgrading its recommendation on DESC to a buy from a long-term buy and is upping its 12-month price target to $27 per ADR, prompted by the company's solid overall fundamentals and the stock's attrative valuation.
-- "We are raising our 1997 EPS for DESC to $2.05 per ADR from $1.90, prompted in large part to a higher contribution from the company's auto parts business," said analyst Mary Bourque in a report.

-- She said the prospects for DESC, with the exception of some downside on the chemicals side, are attractive as 1) auto parts should grow robustly in both 1997 and 1998, 2) real estate should strengthen from its very depressed 1996 base, 3) the company has made very important strides in strengthening its capital structure.
-- The ADR was trading at 23-3/4 in mid-day trade.
